entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Configuration Binder source generator generates uncompilable code for SslClientAuthenticationOptions #107003
    9.0.0
  • Versions of third-party-libraries (libpng16.dll , pcre2-8-0.dll & openssl.dll) used by dotnet runtime. #107001
  • net8.0: Using unmanaged function pointer in a generic class throws "System.BadImageFormatException: Bad element type in SizeOf" #106997
  • TimeProviderTaskExtensions.Delay CancellationToken behavior is inconsistent with Task.Delay #106996
  • Should microsoft.netcore.app.crossgen2.linux-x64 contain libclrjit_unix_riscv64_x64 ? #106992
  • Nested types do not respect TypeNameParseOptions.MaxNodes #106991
    9.0.0
  • `dotnet-pgo` used in build with new packages without ensuring matching framework #106983
  • Suggestion `ComWrappers.TryGetComInstance()` to improve UX #106979
    Future
  • "Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.Binder" v8.x causes WPF self-contained publish failed #106974
    9.0.0
  • Type test `List<T> is Iterator<T>` that can never succeed is not optimized away #106966
    10.0.0
  • MAUI Dns.GetHostEntry(hostNameOrAddress) on Android returns "hostname nor servname provided, or not known", where Xamarin.Forms worked #106969
    Future
  • [mono] .NET 10 Performance Overview #106953
    10.0.0
  • Test failure: baseservices/TieredCompilation/BasicTestWithMcj/BasicTestWithMcj.cmd #106949
  • Test failure: readytorun/coreroot_determinism/coreroot_determinism/coreroot_determinism.cmd #106948
    10.0.0
  • Test failure: System.Text.Json.SourceGeneration.Tests.NumberHandlingTests_Default.Number_AsRootType_RoundTrip #106947
    9.0.0
  • Test failure: profiler\\elt\\slowpatheltleave\\slowpatheltleave.cmd #106946
    10.0.0
  • Test failure: System.Net.Quic.Tests.QuicListenerTests.TwoListenersOnSamePort_DisjointAlpn_Success #106945
  • Test failure: System.Net.Quic.Tests.QuicListenerTests.AcceptConnectionAsync_ThrowingCallbackOde_KeepRunning #106944
  • Test failure: System.Net.Quic.Tests.QuicConnectionTests.DisposeAfterCloseCanceled #106943
  • Test failure: System.Net.Quic.Tests.QuicConnectionTests.AcceptStreamAsync_ConnectionDisposed_Throws #106942
  • Test failure: System.Net.Quic.Tests.QuicConnectionTests.ConnectionClosedByPeer_WithPendingAcceptAndConnect_PendingAndSubsequentThrowConnectionAbortedException #106941
  • Test failure: XmlSerializerTests.Xml_DerivedIXmlSerializable #106940

Closed

  • JIT: `ArgumentOutOfRangeException` in debug but not release with `DotProductBySelectedQuadruplet` #106608
    10.0.0
  • JIT: Debug/Release diff for `AdvSimd.ShiftRightLogicalNarrowingLower` #106546
    9.0.0
  • DynamicInterfaceCastableImplementation virtual table mismatch #106952
    10.0.0
  • Improve error message when there is an empty runtime folder #45617
    Future
  • Socket Connection Issues on macOS Ventura #106950
  • Runtime GC metrics should show default zero prior to first GC #106733
    9.0.0
  • Monitor has no owner thread, but million waiters #106508
  • Using "Source generation for ComWrappers" documentation code crashes .NET 8 with a System.ExecutionEngineException #106978
    9.0.0
  • [Mono] Implement small types atomic intrinsics for CompareExchange and Exchange #93488
    9.0.0
  • [mono][Perf] ConcurrentBag Regressions on 7/19/2024 6:55:27 PM, missing `Interlocked.Exchange` intrinsics #105335
    9.0.0
  • crossgen2 fails when a Managed C++ dll is passed as a reference assembly #67849
    10.0.0
  • NET8 : Nested await Task.WhenAll() doesn't work anymore after NET7->NET8 migration and is stuck with excessive CPU usage. #105576
    9.0.0
  • failure in TestStackOverflow.Program.TestStackOverflow3 #106021
  • SIMD multiplication by scalar UInt64 can produce incorrect results on Arm64 #106838
    9.0.0
  • `dotnet test` is not running tests for .NETFramework targets #94183
    9.0.0
  • JIT: Assertion failed '!arg->OperIsPutArg()' during 'Lowering nodeinfo' #106876
    9.0.0
  • [WASI][Mono-AOT] Invariant.Tests.dll test failure #102128
    10.0.0
  • WasmApp.Native.targets warning WASM0001: Could not get pinvoke, or callbacks for method 'System.Tests.TimeZoneInfoTests+WindowsUILanguageHelper::EnumUILanguages' because 'Parsing function pointer types in signatures is not supported.' - ProxyProjectForAOTOnHelix.proj #100562
    Future
  • [browser][MT] WasmBrowserTestRunner.RunConsoleMessagesPump - abrupt disconect #101618
    10.0.0
  • [wasm][7.0-staging] `System.Runtime.Intrinsics`, and `System.Runtime` tests with AOT timing out on windows #87482
    Future
  • [browser] RuntimeError: memory access out of bounds #96546
    10.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Define a merged runner for the nativeaot subtree and run every test out-of-proc and don't reference the xunit generator #107002
    test-enhancement, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • GC test cleanup #107000
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Test for #106930 #106999
    area-System.Threading
  • Extend timeout when waiting for service status #106998
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2524571 #106995
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Upgrade vendored Brotli dependency to v1.1.0 #106994
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • [release/9.0] Fix copying ephemeral keys to keychains #106993
    area-System.Security
  • ILLink: fix TypeProxy implementation of equality #106990
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [JIT] Allow side-effects for the first test in switch recognition #106988
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Disable test that validates specific copy constructor counts on JitStress #106987
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Tensor Operation fixes when input is sliced (non-contiguous) #106985
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Code cleanup: Replace TODO with Note in assertionprop regarding using a precise range for IntegralRange #106982
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Ensure that AdvSimd.Insert doesn't zero out the upper bits #106981
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] Backport Azure Linux test changes #106980
    area-System.Security, test-enhancement, 9.0.0
  • [WASI] sockets #106977
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net.Sockets, os-wasi, 10.0.0
  • Code cleanup: Remove TODO in assertionprop regarding optVNConstantPropOnJTrue removin trees twice #106976
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Fix RunClassConstructor trim warning for Nullable<T> #106975
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • Fix copying ephemeral keys to keychains #106973
    area-System.Security, 10.0.0
  • [release/9.0] Ensure that Arm64 correctly handles multiplication of simd by a 64-bit scalar #106972
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [release/9.0] JIT: Fix `CndSel(AllTrue, op2, op3) -> op2` "next" node return #106971
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Disable mutual_recursion F# test under GC stress #106968
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Don't use WeakReferences in the BF round trip test #106967
    area-System.Resources, test-enhancement, 10.0.0
  • Revert Revert "Copy published crossgen2 in artifacts/tests (#80154)" #106965
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Introducing new event for failed http requests #106284 #106964
    area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory, community-contribution
  • [no merge][interp] align check atomic ops on wasm #106963
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • SPMI: Add a public test version of the superpmi-collect pipeline #106960
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement getClassAssemblyName #106959
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wip][mono][infra] Try macOS arm64 LLVM AOT runtime test builds on helix #106958
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [wip][mono][infra] Increase timeout for fullAOT jobs #106955
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [release/9.0][no-merge][testing][Android] Run runtime and libraries tests on different Android API version #106951
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, os-android, area-Infrastructure-mono

Merged

  • JIT: Preserve range check for HW intrinsics with non-const/out-of-range immediates #106765
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Correct the _ComponentResources for net8/9 #106989
    needs-area-label
  • Remove jit helpers for writing IBC log data #106791
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable CommittedUsage event for segments #106831
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Set GC metrics to zero prior to first GC #106734
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric
  • [RISC-V] Add JIT Helpers for RISCV64 #106540
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [release/9.0][Workloads] Update the net8/9 component resources #106984
    Servicing-approved, blocking-release, area-Workloads
  • Fix alloc-dealloc mismatch #106957
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use OpenSSL 3's HKDF if it is available #106906
    area-System.Security, cryptographic-docs-impact, 10.0.0
  • [PERF] Remove python venv module installation from setup script #106896
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fix IL2104 link #106895
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [release/9.0] JIT: emit vzeroupper before calls to the bulk write barrier helper #106937
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] Test fix: Disable IOCP config var test #106894
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Threading, 9.0.0
  • [release/9.0] [mono][mini] Interlocked.CompareExchange and Interlocked.Exchange intrinsics for small types and enums #106897
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 9.0.0
  • [release/9.0] [mono] inflate function pointer types; hang indirect call wrappers on the <Module> #106926
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 9.0.0
  • Ensure that Arm64 correctly handles multiplication of simd by a 64-bit scalar #106839
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Don't copy XUnit runner to output for local builds #106721
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • JIT: Fix `CndSel(AllTrue, op2, op3) -> op2` "next" node return #106954
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Revert "Copy published crossgen2 in artifacts/tests (#80154)" #106956
    area-crossgen2-coreclr

Updated

  • Convert tests under GC subtree to the merged test model #92543
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Fix object.GetType dataflow edge case #106909
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • Remove the rest of the SimdAsHWIntrinsic support #106594
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Support emitting array in dynamic event #105955
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [WASI] WasiEventLoop to keep Task alive #106633
    arch-wasm, area-Interop-mono, os-wasi, 10.0.0
  • Upgrade zlib-ng to 2.2.1 #105771
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Remove JitGenericHandleCache #106843
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [TypeName] Nested types should respect MaxNode count #106334
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, binaryformatter-migration, 9.0.0
  • Remove ArrayClass::m_ElementType - get type from the type handle on MethodTable #106787
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • Don't keep members of pointer or byref element types #106215
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Split identifier calculation from code context and bind marshallers to the code context #106846
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • GC cleanup #105517
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Fix errors in WhyDgml and account for cycles #106928
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Cleanup VARIANT marshalling and convert to managed #102498
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove non INPLACE_RUNTIME NativeAOT paths, cleanup exceptions #100379
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, needs-author-action
  • [NativeAOT] `clang -fuse-ld=lld` output is low priority #102000
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [WIP][mono] Try enable fullAOT-llvm arm64 CI jobs #106615
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [release/8.0-staging] Update Azure Linux tag names #106884
    area-Infrastructure
  • Randomized allocation sampling #104955
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Target .NET 10 / net10.0 #106599
    area-Infrastructure
  • Enable all AVX-512 ISA's in Crossgen2 and ILC When Supported #106792
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Update System.Net.* unit tests to react to SYSLIB0057 obsoletion #104487
    area-System.Net, test-enhancement
  • NativeAOT the XUnitLogChecker #103795
    area-Infrastructure
  • [WASI] improve UCO sample and WBT #106632
    arch-wasm, area-Interop-mono, os-wasi, 10.0.0
  • Stop counting work items from ThreadPoolTypedWorkItemQueue for ThreadPool.CompletedWorkItemCount #106854
    area-System.Threading
  • Fix storage of stack trace of exception from reflection #106901
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • BinaryFormatter tests should be skipped only on AOT, WASM and Mobile #106858
    area-System.Runtime, test-enhancement, binaryformatter-migration
  • Provide System.Composition.AttributedModel package readme #106781
    area-System.Composition
  • Provide System.Composition.Convention package readme #106782
    area-System.Composition, community-contribution
  • Provide System.Composition.Hosting package readme #106783
    area-System.Composition, community-contribution
  • Provide System.Composition.TypedParts package readme #106785
    area-System.Composition, community-contribution
  • Provide System.Composition.Runtime package readme #106784
    area-System.Composition, community-contribution
  • [release/9.0] Emscripten version reference for RTM build #106881
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Optimize write barriers for server gc on arm64 #106934
    area-VM-coreclr
  • add support for parallel Connect #106374
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Net.Sockets, new-api-needs-documentation, 10.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] Return null instead of throwing in ServiceDescriptor.ImplementationInstance\Type\Factory if a keyed service #106841
    Servicing-consider, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, 8.0.x
  • Added additional tests for generic attributes. #106745
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Add a SearchValues implementation for values with unique low nibbles #106900
    area-System.Memory, 10.0.0
  • Add randomized allocation sampling #100356
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix typo in comment of SAVE_ARGUMENT_REGISTERS #106011
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Implement `IUtf8SpanParsable` on `IPAddress` and `IPNetwork` #102144
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Disable event source in mobile sample apps #106880
    test-enhancement, os-android, area-VM-meta-mono, os-ios, 10.0.0
  • [wasm] Clean emsdk setup #106403
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Invalid Release code generation for `wasi-wasm` #2671
  • No stringToNewUTF8 #2669

PullRequests

Merged

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] disable SocketsHttpHandler support for WASI #2667
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] support `System.Net.Http.HttpClient` on WASIp2 #2614
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM
  • Integrate TypeSpec into TypeDecls and ABI parsing. #2650

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Package installation fails for unlisted package version #43013
  • RHEL9: missing dotnet-runtime-deps-8.0-8.0.8 #43009

Closed

  • System.ServiceModel.InstanceContextMode not found in System.ServiceModel.Primitives (8.0.0, and lower) nuget package #42999
  • [Question] Resolving runtime assemblies for .NET Core application #2434
    Discussion

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/9.0.1xx] Update OmniSharp version used by source build tests #43010
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Define "ToolingPackageVersion" properties for msbuild tooling dependencies #43008
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Send supported protocol version to the testing platform #43003
    Area-DotNet Test, untriaged

Merged

  • [release/9.0.1xx] Extend `dotnet run` to invoke a run-command-producing Target #42987
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [main] Update triggers for SB sdk diff and license scan pipelines #43011
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • fix regression in --property forwarding with an invalid argument #43004
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update triggers for SB sdk diff and license scan pipelines #43006
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx] Increase license scan file timeout #43005
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Increase license scan file timeout #43002
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update OmniSharp version used by source build tests #42707
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Enable workload search for users to find latest set versions #42652
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • add signature VerifySigning for dotnet tools #39268
    Area-Tools
  • Alpha Branding #42743
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • .NET Source-Build 9.0.100-preview.7.24407.1 August 2024 Updates #42699
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add source.dot.net stage 1 asset publication #42132
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Permit workload restore to work with new global.json #42606
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'main' #42807
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
  • Revert disabling the toolset package in Helix #42860
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add analyzer redirecting VSIX #42861
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Put binlog directly into the VMR's #42984
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add net10.0 known framework references #42969
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-26
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Extensions #5497
    Working Set
  • Proposal: `field` keyword in properties #140
    Working Set
  • [Proposal]: Overload Resolution Priority #7706
    Working Set
  • Champion: Remove error "Cannot yield a value in the body of a try block with a catch clause" #2949
    Any Time

PullRequests

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Build host should localize message output #74902
  • `dotnet_analyzer_diagnostic.category-Naming.severity` does not apply to naming rule violations #74901
  • [Feature] Collapse multiple leading #pragma lines #74897
    Backlog

Closed

  • Params collection as AppendLiteral parameter causes crash #74733
    17.12

PullRequests

Created

  • Snap for 17.12 P3 #74908
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Needs UX Triage, VSCode
  • Initial work to create a service for returning related documents for copilot purposes. #74906
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Double check document changes when dismiss rename #74905
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • update configs for snap #74904
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [WIP] per-file content exclusion #74903
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Handle infinite cycles through params collection initializers #74899
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Simplify and unify assembly loader provider #74895
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, 17.12 P2
  • Remove incorrect cast #74876
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.12 P2
  • Fix handling default copilot option values #74866
    Area-IDE, untriaged, 17.12 P2
  • Workaround failure to declare GenerateManifests as a dependency of _CopyResolvedFilesToPublishPreserveNewest #74842
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, 17.12 P2
  • Update dartlab pipeline #74811
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, 17.12 P2

Updated

  • Report nullable ctor warnings for struct primary constructors #74844
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Field-backed properties: update uses of IsAutoProperty #74798
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Remove last custom ref test assemblies #74880
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add option for LSP based auto-insert #74485
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Load analyzers and generators in isolated ALCs in our OOP process #74780
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Use InterceptorsNamespaces feature name instead of InterceptorsPreviewNamespaces #74865
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix copilot options default value handling #74867
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Always take ownership from UIThreadContext when rename commit #74889
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Make host outputs public #74750
    Area-Compilers, Needs API Review
  • Add `IAnalyzerAssemblyResolver` public API #74820
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Add explicit cast to UseCoalesceExpressionForIfNullStatementCheckCodeFixProvider #74471
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Retry `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Server.IIS.NewShim.FunctionalTests.NewShimTests.CheckNewShimIsUsed`` #57538
  • Blazor - Accessing an API controller endpoint is triggering Routes.razor #57535
  • Perf regression: fortunes, json_middleware #57534
  • How to set prerender on all client WASM portion of a Blazor Web App #57532
  • [Blazor] Dynamically Load Library Like Mvc #57530
  • [Blazor] Activate InteractiveServer/InteractiveWebAssembly as soon as possible during StreamRender #57525
  • [Blazor] Improve StreamRender diffing and DOM change detection #57523
  • [Blazor] Detect pre compressed assets in packages, avoid compressing those assets and emit a warning instead #57518
    9.0-rc2
  • OutputCache: expose `OutputCacheStream ` for reading in `ServeResponseAsync(..)` so response tags can be built #57517
  • [9.0.100-rc.2.24423.15] StaticWebAssets SDK - Conflicting assets in the same target path #57512

Closed

  • Perf improvement: connectionclosehttps, single_query #57506
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper #57514
  • Perf regression: json_middleware #57515
  • Published size regression: todosapivanilla #57505
  • Published size regression: basicminimalapivanilla, basicminimalapivanilla, todosapivanilla #57504
  • Published size regression: todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot #57516
  • Merge dotnet/xdt into aspnetcore #51753
    Backlog
  • Option to use static ports in launchSettings.json #57508
  • Intermittent Error on Build #57147
  • [Blazor]AuthenticationState inside component return Authenticated as true after SignOut #57368

PullRequests

Created

  • Provide `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Diagnostics.EntityFramework` package README #57540
    area-networking, area-middleware
  • Remove some tests from helix retry list #57539
    area-infrastructure
  • Provide `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Identity.EntityFrameworkCore` package README #57537
    area-identity
  • bumping ws dependency to fix component vulnerability #57536
    area-signalr, community-contribution
  • Quarantine Http3RequestTests.POST_Expect100Continue_Get100Continue #57533
    area-networking
  • Http.Sys: Clean up Request parsing errors #57531
    area-networking, 9.0-rc2

Merged

  • Middleware/Rewrite: Update XML comments for "AddRedirect" to indicate status code. #57224
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking, area-middleware, 10.0-preview1

Updated

  • Validate local development scenarios in CI #57492
    area-infrastructure
  • Removing unsafe code in BufferExtensions #57417
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • QuickGrid: Add EventCallback<TGridItem> for clicking on a row. #55851
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-26
entry.content:
PullRequests

Updated

  • Sync shared (PAL, utilcode, inc, etc.) files with latest runtime #4885

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [net9.0] MAUI new project doesn't have deploy checked for android configuration on Windows #24452
    9.0-rc2
  • DrawString not rendering in iOS. #24450
  • Warning MA002 should indicate where to place the <PackageReference /> element #24448
  • Android `Resource` class triggers IDE002 #24447
  • AppThemeBindings don't update value when used on a PlatformBehavior #24444
  • Animated label causes scrollbar to show #24440
  • Border with stacklayout inside will render its contents incorrectly for multiple values of VerticalOptions #24437
  • [MAUI] From 'Edit recipe' to return to the Recipe details, the 'Ingredients' & 'Recipe' contents appear blank. #24434
    .NET 8 SR9
  • Gestures still don't work on Label Spans #24432

Closed

  • Enabling the `MauiEnablePlatformUsings` MSBuild project property has no effect on the Windows native project #24451
  • [Windows] Defining CollectionView GroupFooterTemplate crashes the app #18702
    Backlog
  • CollectionView has inconsistent behavior if GroupHeaderTemplate not specified #24007
  • "FragmentManager has been destroyed" upon changing orientation of phone, after app is closed, but after a foreground service has started #19320
  • [MacCatalyst] Failure to run in release mode (arm64) #24404
  • [regression/8.0.3] Image no longer fits container #18698
  • [Binding SG] XamlPreCompile task fails on Windows #23558
    Backlog
  • Unable to Login with Social Media like Facebook #22704
  • MAUI .NET8 Windows ListView HasUnevenRows crashes #19269
    Backlog
  • [regression/8.0.0] New MAUI project template in .NET 8 is defining default svg files as AndroidResource #17993
  • NET Maui app with none shell navigation bug #19480
  • CollectionView ItemTemplate OnSelectTemplate is not called when the ItemsSource is updated #20220
  • InvalidOperationException: Error: There is no browser renderer with ID 3. #23292
  • CollectionView not scrolling on MacCatalyst/macOS #20240
  • Support for ARCore #24435
  • MSB4044 The "GenerateRtxt" task was not given a value for the required parameter "JavaPlatformJarPath" #23840

PullRequests

Created

  • [resizetizer] fix a build performance issue #24453
    area-single-project
  • [Binding SG] Fix formatting #24442
  • Fix Text entry border disappear when changing to/from dark mode in Android #24433
    community ✨
  • [Android] Fix for the CarouselView doesn't scroll to the right Position after changing the ItemSource with Loop enabled. #24431
    community ✨

Merged

  • [relase/9.0.0-rc1] Bump net8 #24449
  • Fixed the CollectionView GroupFooterTemplate crashes the application #24205
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨
  • Revert "Add some defensive code around layout propagation (#24217)" #24446
  • [net9.0] Android RC 1 build, with feeds #24445
    area-infrastructure
  • [net9.0] Fix loop CarouselViewHandler2 #24230
    9.0-rc1
  • Revert "Add some defensive code around layout propagation (#24217)" #24441
  • [ci] Update push-nightly.yml #24438

Updated

  • Fix for FlexLayout padding issue #24195
    community ✨
  • Fix "Grey" cannot be used to set Background property #24325
    community ✨
  • [Windows] - Picker on windows shows "Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Picker" if ItemsSource has an empty string #24276
    community ✨
  • Fixed the label text from being cut off from the top when the specified LineHeight. #24273
    community ✨
  • [Windows] Fix Entry clear button is not taking the color of the text. #24196
    community ✨
  • [Android] Ensure all controls in Layout with Search Bar are visible in Landscape Mode #24198
    community ✨
  • Stepper doesn't change increment value when being bound to a double in MVVM context (Windows) #24396
    community ✨
  • [iOS] Bugfix/22469 ios label crash #22487
    community ✨, area-controls-label
  • [iOS] Fix Button image sizing and layout #22476
    platform/iOS 🍎, partner/cat 😻, area-controls-button
  • Fix shadow consistency on Android and iOS #24415
    community ✨
  • [net9.0] Move to internal net9 rc1 #24399
  • Fix border lagging and unwanted animations on iOS #24360
    community ✨
  • Picker in ListView works on Windows but not on Android #24403
    community ✨
  • Revert "[ios] fix memory leak in CollectionView cells (#15831)" #24310
    community ✨
  • Port all remaining Xamarin.UITest tests to Appium #24153
    area-testing
  • BarBackground with Brush in NavigationPage on theme change #24429
    area-navigation, platform/iOS 🍎, partner/android
  • 894511 : Shell Tab is still visible after set Tab.IsVisible to false #24161
    community ✨
  • Improve performance and stability of `BindableLayout` #23136
    area-layout, community ✨
  • [Android] Map FlowDirection of shell to PlatformView on Android #23473
    community ✨

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Replicate xUnit analyzers for our test attributes #34536
    MQ
  • Views migrations in EF-Core migrations? #34530
  • `dotnet ef migrations` does not work correctly with more than one model and migrations added in a non default location. #34528
  • Strange memory behaviour with large number of columns #34527

Closed

  • Function schema name is lost when AsSplitQuery() is applied #34341
    9.0.0
  • Concurrency Handling in UpdateRange case #34481
  • Temp id is not replaced with permanent value after SaveChanges #34309
  • Still this issue not being fixed until now #34265
  • API throwing has exited with code 3221225477 (0xc0000005) 'Access violation' #34251
  • AutoInclude() for self-referencing entities. Resolving cycles. #34198
  • Null reference when calling SaveChangesAsync method using transaction scope - Distributed transaction - Oracle and MSSQL #33662
  • Task Discriminator_values_are_not_marked_as_unknown cannot be overwritten. #34517
    9.0.0-rc2

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/9.0] Make nested generic type generation consistent #34537
  • Move runtime override to tests #34535
    blocked
  • (RC2) (Test only) Fix async void tests #34529
    tell-mode

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0' => 'main' #34513
  • Make Discriminator_values_are_not_marked_as_unknown virtual (#34517) #34520
    community-contribution
